entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 13.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
